arcade.env.comp

Class TriPatternSites

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.env.comp.Sites
      • arcade.env.comp.PatternSites
        • arcade.env.comp.TriPatternSites
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable

    public class TriPatternSites
extends PatternSites
    Extension of PatternSites for triangular lattice.

    The pattern unit cell for pattern is given by: 

        -----------------------------
    \   / \   / \ 2 / \   / \   /
     \ /   \ / 1 \ / 1 \ / 1 \ /
      -------------------------
     / \   / \ 1 / \ 2 / \ 2 / \
    /   \ /   \ / 2 \ /   \ /   \
    -----------------------------
    \   / \ 1 / \   / \   / \   /
     \ /   \ / 2 \ /   \ /   \ /
      -------------------------
     / \ 1 / \   / \   / \   / \
    / 1 \ / 2 \ /   \ /   \ /   \
    -----------------------------
    \ 2 / \ 2 / \   / \   / \   /
     \ / 1 \ /   \ /   \ /   \ /
      -------------------------
     / \   / \ 2 / \   / \   / \
    /   \ / 1 \ /   \ /   \ /   \
    -----------------------------
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.3.12
    See Also:
